page.shortlink: ux controlbar items item properties item size property
page.description: Item size allows you to specify the size (either width or height depending on whether the ControlBar is horizontal or vertical). You can leave this property blank and a default size will be used.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Item size]* property defines the item's size. For horizontal ControlBars, *[ui:Item size]* defines the width of the item specified using CSS syntax. For vertical ControlBars, *[ui:Item size]* defines the height of the item.
This property is optional unless the *[ui:Item type]* is 'edit'.
